result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mathew John D'Acquisto Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Mathew John D'Acquisto in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Dirk Christian Jensen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue
St- In 14CF69 amend count 1 to Possess w/ Intent - THC; DRI count 2 & count 3. In 14CF1284 DRI file.
Rights Given
P-NC
BTC: Finding of guilt on count 1 as amended; DRI count 2 & count 3 in 14CF69. DRI 14CF1284. Order PSI.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 5, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Mathew John D'Acquisto in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
BTC: Trial rescheduled due to other trial that is going
  Jury trial scheduled for January 26, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Department Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 3:00 p.m.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.    Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780) exceptions are going to court and meeting w/his Atty.   Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
5/05/2015 BOND AMENDED: GPS to be removed. Defendant must live at mother's home and follow her rules. Curfew 10pm unless extended by mother. No cs/alcohol - ZCI to monitor. No driving unless validly licensed.

Defendant Mathew John D'Acquisto in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
St - Req adj
Def - Req bond modified to remove GPS
BTC: Bond modified to remove GPS monitoring. Must live at mother's home and follow all her rules. 10pm curfew unless extended by mother. No alc/cs. ZCI to monitor. No driving unless validly licensed. 
  Jury trial scheduled for August 25, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Mathew John D'Acquisto in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
Def - No resolution
  Jury trial scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on December 12, 2014 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Mathew John D'Acquisto in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter, Katie Giebel.  ADA handling the case is ill, all cases distributed to other ADAs   30 day adj granted   Dirty UA in the past.  Must go for testing today.  Status conference scheduled for December 12, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on October 21, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Preliminary hearing on October 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond. This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.    Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Mathew John D'Acquisto in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.
